chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
The phone was delivered to me. After just the first 1-2 days, I noticed that my battery only lasts for 4 hours at most. That's too little. I'd like to have the same phone, but I think the battery should at least last a day.

Thank you very much for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
KW
